Module phpjavabridge
Package api.syntaxerror.phpjavabridge

Class BridgeImpl.UDP

java.lang.Object
api.syntaxerror.phpjavabridge.Bridge
api.syntaxerror.phpjavabridge.BridgeImpl.UDP
Enclosing class:
BridgeImpl
public static class BridgeImpl.UDP
extends Bridge
The User Datagram Protocol (UDP) is a connectionless data transmission protocol

Compared to BridgeImpl.TCP:
  • faster than TCP
  • unreliable

see the Wikipedia Article

  • Constructor Details

    • UDP

      public UDP​(int port, boolean useAES, java.lang.String password, int maxPacketLength)
      Instantiates a new UDP-based PHP-Java-Bridge
      Parameters:
      port - the port in range [0;65535]
      useAES - whether or not AES-256-CBC is used (requres password)
      password - the password required for AES encryption
      maxPacketLength - the max. packet length. default 65535
